lead_paragraph: Three jailed Mauritanian antislavery activists began a hunger strike on Monday to protest “squalid conditions” and abuse by the prison authorities, their campaign group said in a statement.

headline.main: Mauritania: Antislavery Activists Begin Hunger Strike Over Prison Conditions
headline.print_headline: Mauritania: Antislavery Activists Begin Hunger Strike Over Prison Conditions

snippet: Three jailed Mauritanian antislavery activists began a hunger strike on Monday to protest “squalid conditions” and abuse by the prison authorities, their campaign group said in a statement.
